title: The True effigies of the monster of Malmesbury, or, Thomas Hobbes in his proper colours
author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.
notes: "Mr. Cowley's verses in praise of Mr. Hobbes, oppos'd" has special t.p.
Each verse by Cowley is followed by a satirical paraphrase.
Imperfect: copy at reel 745:15 contains only "Mr Cowqley's verses in praise of Mr. Hobbes, oppos'd"; copy at reel 337:13 may lack part of "To the reader" (cf. catchword).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Libraries and Huntington Library.
